message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1800000. This is a significant opportunity for you to secure a valuable asset at a potentially advantageous price.  Please let me know your decision. If you decline, I have another interested buyer who is ready to pay $1500000.
